name: Manual Override - JamGame
description:
Entry into the LibGDX 7 day game jam for March 2020

Theme: Global Thermonuclear War

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to manuver. (controls are meant to be floaty)

Avoid Obstacles while you descend and guide you bomb to the target.

Fly through Trajectory Rings to collect points

Game is meant to be short, less than 2 minutes to complete. But it may take many tries.

I didn't have much time to test so. Be wary of difficulty or bugs. I added in an easy mode option just in case. So people can at least get to the ending. 

This game is an homage to my favorite scene from the movie Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb.

The guidance systems on the bomb have malfunctioned. It's up to you to make the sacrifice and guide it your target. Yeeeee Haaaaw!

All assets were created by me with 3 exceptions:

Airplane wing taken from: https://opengameart.org/content/airplane

Big explosion taken from https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-explosion-12-frames

All sounds were found on freesound.org
